Author: banana_nutcase007
Text: Sizing is so weird, like it’s either vanity-sized to hell and back or built for a child haha. Idk man, it’s a crapshoot finding clothes that fit well and seriously a hella not-fun experience most of the time.

Author: _Fr0gg0_
Text: Clothes shopping literally gives me anxiety for this exact reason. Idk why it has to be so hard :/
